all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For unto him that receiveth it shall be given more abundantly, even power.
Doctrine and Covenants 71:6
Quote of the Day
"The plan of salvation is a plan of happiness precisely because it is a “plan of mercy.”"
Elder James R. Rasband | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
